00051 template<typename FFTFloat>
00052 class multi_downconvert_processor : public processor::base_iq {
00053 protected:
00054   class filter_param {
00055   public:
00056     filter_param(std::string name="",
00057                  double cutoff=0,
00058                  double center_freq_Hz=0,
00059                  size_t decim=1)
00060       : name_(name)
00061       , cutoff_(cutoff)
00062       , center_freq_input_Hz_(0)
00063       , center_freq_Hz_(center_freq_Hz)
00064       , offset_(0)
00065       , decim_(decim)
00066       , handle_(0)
00067       , initialized_(false) {}
00068 
00069     std::string name() const { return name_; }
00070     size_t handle()    const { return handle_; }
00071     double cutoff()    const { return cutoff_; }
00072     double center_freq_input_Hz() const { return center_freq_input_Hz_; }
00073     double center_freq_Hz()       const { return center_freq_Hz_; }
00074     double offset()    const { return offset_; }
00075     size_t decim()     const { return decim_; }
00076     bool initialized() const { return initialized_; }
00077 
00078     filter_param& update_offset(double _center_freq_input_Hz,
00079                                 boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz) {
00080       assert(sample_rate_Hz != 0.0);
00081       center_freq_input_Hz_ = _center_freq_input_Hz;
00082       offset_               = (center_freq_input_Hz()-center_freq_Hz())/sample_rate_Hz;
00083       return *this;
00084     }
00085     //                                           (handle, offset)
00086     filter_param& set_initialized(const std::pair<size_t,double>& r, boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz) {
00087       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("set_initialized: offset= %15.6f Hz center_freq= %15.6f Hz")
00088                    % (sample_rate_Hz*offset())
00089                    % center_freq_input_Hz()));
00090       offset_         = r.second;
00091       center_freq_Hz_ = center_freq_input_Hz() - sample_rate_Hz*offset();
00092       handle_         = r.first;
00093       initialized_    = true;
00094       return *this;
00095     }
00096 
00097     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const filter_param& fp) {
00098       return os << fp.name() << " " << fp.offset() << " " << fp.center_freq_Hz() << " " << fp.decim();
00099     }
00100 
00101   protected:
00102   private:
00103     std::string name_;                 // filter name
00104     double      cutoff_;               // normalized cutoff frequency
00105     double      center_freq_input_Hz_; //
00106     double      center_freq_Hz_;       // 
00107     double      offset_;               // normalized frequency (relative to center_freq_input_Hz)
00108     size_t      decim_;                // decimation factor
00109     size_t      handle_;               // overlap_save handle
00110     bool        initialized_;          //
00111   } ;

00114   class service_dc : public service {
00115   public:
00116     typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_dc> sptr;

00118                      service::sptr   sp,
00119                      std::string     stream_name,
00120                      boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz,
00121                      double          center_frequency_Hz) {
00122       return sptr(new service_dc(pp, sp, stream_name,
00123                                  sample_rate_Hz, center_frequency_Hz));
00124     }
00125     virtual ~service_dc() {}
00126 
00127     virtual std::string     id()                  const { return sp_->id(); }
00128     virtual ptime           approx_ptime()        const { return sp_->approx_ptime(); }
00129     virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number()       const { return sp_->stream_number(); }
00130     virtual std::string     stream_name()         const { return stream_name_; }
00131     virtual boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz()      const { return sample_rate_Hz_; }

00133     virtual float           offset_ppb()          const { return offset_ppb_.first; }
00134     virtual float           offset_ppb_rms()      const { return offset_ppb_.second; }

00137       pp_->put_result(rp);
00138     }

00140       return pp_->get_result(name);
00141     }

00144   private:
00145     service_dc(multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>* pp,
00146                service::sptr   sp,
00147                std::string     stream_name,
00148                boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz,
00149                double          center_frequency_Hz)
00150       : pp_(pp)
00151       , sp_(sp)
00152       , stream_name_(stream_name)
00153       , sample_rate_Hz_(sample_rate_Hz)
00154       , center_frequency_Hz_(center_frequency_Hz)
00155       , offset_ppb_(pp->calibration_offset_ppb()) {}

00158     const service::sptr   sp_;
00159     const std::string     stream_name_;
00160     const boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz_;
00161     const double          center_frequency_Hz_;
00162     const std::pair<double,double> offset_ppb_;

00165   // list of filter parameters
00166   typedef std::vector<filter_param> filter_params;
00167 
00168   // filter name -> associated iq processor sptr
00169   typedef std::map<std::string, processor::base_iq::sptr> processor_map;
00170 
00171   // 
00172   typedef std::map<std::string, processor::result_base::sptr> result_map;
00173 
00174   // 
00175   typedef std::vector<std::string> calibration_keys;
00176 
00177 public: 
00178   typedef boost::shared_ptr< multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat> > sptr;
00179   typedef typename filter::fir::overlap_save<FFTFloat> overlap_save_type;
00180 
00181   multi_downconvert_processor(const ptree& config)
00182     : base_iq(config)
00183     , overlap_save_(config.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.l"),
00184                     config.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.m")) {
00185     // Filters
00186     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& filt, config.get_child("Filters")) {
00187       if (filt.first == "FIR") {
00188         const filter_param fp(filt.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"), 
00189                               filt.second.get<double>("<xmlattr>.cutoff"),
00190                               filt.second.get<double>("<xmlattr>.centerFrequency_Hz"),
00191                               filt.second.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.decim"));
00192         filter_params_.push_back(fp);
00193         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("multi_downconvert_processor: filter %s") % fp));
00194       } else {
00195         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("multi_downconvert_processor: unknown filter type '%s'")
00196                       % filt.first));
00197       }
00198     }    
00199     // Processors
00200     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& p, config.get_child("Processors")) {
00201       const std::string type(p.first);
00202       const std::string name(p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"));
00203       const std::string input(p.second.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.input"));
00204       processor::base_iq::sptr
00205         pp(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<processor::base_iq>(processor::registry::make(type, p.second)));
00206       if (not pp) {
00207         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("failed to make processor '%s' type='%s'") % name % type));
00208         continue;
00209       }
00210       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("making processor '%s' type='%s' input='%s'") % name % type % input));
00211       processor_map_[input] = pp;
00212     }
00213     // Calibration
00214     const ptree& cal_config(config.get_child("Calibration"));
00215     const std::string cal_algo(cal_config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.algorithm"));
00216     if (cal_algo != "WeightedMean")
00217       LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("unsupported calibration algorithm '%s' requested") % cal_algo));
00218     BOOST_FOREACH(const ptree::value_type& p, cal_config) { 
00219       if (p.first != "Key") {
00220         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("ignoring Calibration tag '%s'") % p.first));
00221         continue;
00222       }
00223       const std::string cal_key(p.second.get<std::string>(""));
00224       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("adding calibration key '%s'") % cal_key));
00225       calibration_keys_.push_back(cal_key);
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229   virtual ~multi_downconvert_processor() {}
00230 
00231   static sptr make(const ptree& config) {
00232     sptr result(new multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>(config));
00233     return result;
00234   }
00235 
00236   virtual void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00237                           const_iterator i0,
00238                           const_iterator i1) {
00239     // (0) possibly broadcast also the incoming data stream
00240     dump(sp, i0, i1);
00241 
00242     // (1) initialize filters
00243     BOOST_FOREACH(filter_param& fp, filter_params_) {
00244       if (not fp.initialized()) {
00245         fp.update_offset(sp->center_frequency_Hz(), sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00246         typename filter::fir::lowpass<FFTFloat> fir(overlap_save_.p());
00247         fir.design(fp.cutoff(), fp.cutoff()/5.);        
00248         fp.set_initialized(overlap_save_.add_filter(fir.coeff(), fp.offset(), fp.decim()),
00249                            sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00250       }
00251     }
00252 
00253     // (2) process I/Q samples
00254     overlap_save_.proc(i0, i1);
00255 
00256     // (3) dump the output of all filters
00257     BOOST_FOREACH(const filter_param& fp, filter_params_) {
00258       service::sptr
00259         sp_dc(service_dc::make(this,
00260                                sp,
00261                                fp.name(),
00262                                sp->sample_rate_Hz()/fp.decim(),
00263                                fp.center_freq_Hz()));
00264       const typename overlap_save_type::complex_vector_type& out(overlap_save_.get_filter(fp.handle())->result());
00265       dump(sp_dc, out.begin(), out.end());
00266       processor_map::iterator i(processor_map_.find(fp.name()));
00267       if (i != processor_map_.end()) {
00268         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("proc %s") % fp));
00269         proc(sp_dc, i->second, out);
00270       }
00271     }
00272   }
00273 
00274 protected:
00275   // may be overwritten in a derived class
00276   virtual void dump(service::sptr sp, const_iterator begin, const_iterator end) {
00277     // std::cout << "out: " << fp.name() << " " << out.size() << std::endl;
00278   }
00279   virtual processor::result_base::sptr dump(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00280     // std::cout << "dump: " << rp->to_string() << std::endl;
00281     return rp;
00282   }
00283   virtual void proc(service::sptr sp,
00284                     processor::base_iq::sptr pp,
00285                     const typename overlap_save_type::complex_vector_type& out) {
00286     pp->process_iq(sp, out.begin(), out.end());
00287   }
00288   
00289 private:
00290   // results
00291   void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00292 //     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("multi_downconvert_processor::put_result %s") % rp->to_string()));
00293     result_map_[rp->name()] = dump(rp);
00294   }
00295   processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const {
00296     result_map::const_iterator i(result_map_.find(name));
00297     return (i != result_map_.end()) ? i->second : processor::result_base::sptr();
00298   }
00299 
00300   //        (ppb, ppb_rms)
00301   std::pair<double, double> calibration_offset_ppb() const {
00302     double sum_wx(0), sum_w(0);
00303     BOOST_FOREACH(const std::string& key, calibration_keys_) {
00304       tracking_goertzel_processor::result::sptr
00305         rp(boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<tracking_goertzel_processor::result>(get_result(key)));
00306       if (not rp) {
00307         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("calibration_offset_ppb: key '%s' not found") % rp));
00308         continue;
00309       }
00310       if (not rp->f_Hz().valid()) continue;
00311       if (rp->f0_Hz() == 0.0) continue; // being pedantic
00312 
00313       const double rms(1e9*rp->f_Hz().rms_value()/rp->f0_Hz());
00314       if (rms > 20.) { // don't use observations with more than 20 ppb error
00315         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("calibration_offset_ppb: observation '%s' not used: rms=%.2f ppb > 20.00 ppb") % rp % rms));
00316         continue;
00317       }
00318       // w_i = 1/sigma_i^2
00319       const double weight((rms != 0. ? 1./(rms*rms) : 0.));
00320       sum_w  += weight;
00321       sum_wx += weight * 1e9*rp->f_Hz().value()/rp->f0_Hz();
00322     }
00323     return (sum_w > 0.)
00324       ? std::make_pair(sum_wx/sum_w, 1./sqrt(sum_w))
00325       : std::make_pair(0., 0.);
00326   }
00327 
00328   overlap_save_type overlap_save_;
00329   filter_params     filter_params_;
00330   processor_map     processor_map_;
00331   result_map        result_map_;
00332   calibration_keys  calibration_keys_;
00333 } ;
